data.title: Pencil Mustache
data.meta_description:
I-I kinda like the way my moustache is coming along. It's a little more work but it reflects my civilized side. The womens at work like it too!
Ernest

George Brent ( 1899 – 1979) Highly regarded by Bette Davis, he became her most frequent male co-star, appearing with her in thirteen films, including Jezebel (1938), Dark Victory (1939) The Great Lie (1941) and many others.. he had a lasting but secret off-screen romance with Bette Davies for several years..

Yesterday I watched "The Misfits" on TCM. This was the last movie of Clark Gable and Marilyn Monroe. Gable was still sporting his pencil mustache, it sure looked great on him. Here was a man who had aged with dignity and class. He died a few weeks after completing filming. It's clear that we will never see stars of this stature again. Marilyn of course was heartbreakingly beautiful.
